org.ipdr.api
Class ConnectionThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.ipdr.api.ConnectionThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ConnectionThread
extends java.lang.Thread

The class represents a single connection thread

ConnectionThread

public ConnectionThread(ConnectionDynamic connection,
                        OutputterFactory outputterFactory,
                        TemplateNegotiatorFactory negotiatorFactory,
                        StateMachineListener listener,
                        ConnectionController connectionController,
                        IncomingConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
Initializes connection thread on the given passive connection

Parameters:
connection - - the related connection
outputterFactory - - the outputter factory
negotiatorFactory - - the template negotiator factory
listener - - for examination of protocol state machine
connectionController - - the connection controller
connectionHandler - - handles incoming connections

sendStartNegotiation

public void sendStartNegotiation(byte sessionId)
                          throws InvalidSessionStateException,
                                 ConnectionException
Sends a "start negotiation" message. The message can only be sent when data is being sent in the specific session.

Parameters:
sessionId - Session id to send the message in
Throws:
InvalidSessionStateException
ConnectionException
